dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Sometimes I get hand tremors... I hope that doesn't make me look like a coward.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Oh! You're back early. As always, I placed any and all contract requests we received today on your desk.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: We should get to work soon. Or our Office might not make our next month's rent.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: It's pretty cold tonight. How about a warm cup of ssanghwa-cha?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Do you listen to music from time to time? I enjoy the sound of cello myself.
One day, I hope to have a chance to try my hand at learning it. I'm sure creating music with my own hands feels different.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Weapons from Stigma Workshop brand their victims with their unique 'stigma'. Even if they were to survive the fight, they'll have to live with that mark for the rest of their lives.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Oh, did you enjoy the ssanghwa-cha? Huh? They'd call me 'The Yellow Ssanghwa' if I ever became a Color...? I mean, I guess my blonde hair does resemble an egg yolk, but... Come on, don't tease me like that.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Are people of the City... not allowed to do anything on behalf of others?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: "For them". "For the others". "For someone else's sake"... You know, they were all just... selfish disguises to hide my true self. Have you ever pretended to be something you're not?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Everyone... needs the time to collect their thoughts.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: No one's going to shed their tears on behalf of my sorrow.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Do we have... a contract? Okay, I'll go get ready.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I'll try my best not to hold you back.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Give me the courage to face something...

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I will follow your judgment.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: I shouldn't hesitate...

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: I feel like I'm just causing you concern...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: ... I have to be bold!

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: I thought... I'd be there for you all the way...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: It was for everyone's sake.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I didn't want to be a baggage... to you all...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: We did suffer some losses, but... only the outcome matters in the end.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: That was certainly a perfect victory. How about we throw a house party like we did last time?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Not yet... I've got to, I've got to go ask for help...!
